title: Very Informative
text: A visit here makes the visit to the Acropolis complete. Almost missed it, even though it is seen off in distance from the Acropolis.

title: Have looked forward to this visit for decades.
text: No first trip to Athens can be complete without doing this. Looking back wish we had went to museum first. The salvaged items displayed there are fantastically!

title: It is great that so much has been salvaged.
text: Wish we had went to museum before going up to Acropolis. Would have understood better. But like most others we could not resist heading up first.

title: Great Tour
text: Smooth timely pick up at hotel. Great knowledgeable guide! Wish had of had time for 2-3 day tour. Will do that next time.

title: Purple Flag Just went up on Santa Rosa Beach
text: We have been coughing all week from Red Tide. It became official about 6:00 pm today, the purple flag just went up.
